description: ERECTION OF REAR EXTENSIONS AT GROUND FLOOR, FIRST FLOOR AND ROOF LEVEL IN CONNECTION WITH THE CONVERSION OF THE UPPER FLOORS INTO TWO FLATS AND EXTENDING THE GROUND FLOOR SHOP.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The developments to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of 5 years, beginning with the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The facing materials to be used for the external surfaces of the building/extension hereby approved shall be those specified in the approved drawing no. C-695-ER-tp01D or planning application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 3 - No structure including plant, water tanks, equipment or machinery shall be placed, erected or installed on or above the roof or on external walls without the prior written approval of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - The roof of the extension or flat roofed areas hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden, sitting out area or for any other purpose of a similar nature without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The floors and walls between each of the proposed dwellings and adjacent dwellings shall be so adapted as to achieve a reasonable resistance to airborne sound and where relevant, impact sound having regard to the existing construction. Insulation shall be in accordance with the scheme previously submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to the commencement of works. Details of the existing floor/ceiling construction and proposed sound insulation measures, together with a composite sound reduction index for the new floor/ceiling will be required.
